org.akubraproject.rmi.remote
Interface RemoteBlob

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerBlob
public interface RemoteBlob
extends Remote

Represents a blob on the remote server.

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan

Method Summary
 void delete()
          Deletes a blob on the remote.
 boolean exists()
          Tests if this blob exists on remote.
 URI getCanonicalId()
          Gets the canonical id of the blob, if known.
 URI getId()
          Gets the id of the blob.
 long getSize()
          Gets the size of the blob from remote.
 RemoteBlob moveTo(URI id, Map<String,String> hints)
          Moves the blob contents to another on the remote.
 RemoteInputStream openInputStream()
          Create a stream to read from the blob on the remote.
 RemoteOutputStream openOutputStream(long estimatedSize, boolean overwrite)
          Create a stream to write to the blob on the remote.
 

Method Detail

getId

URI getId()
          throws RemoteException
Gets the id of the blob.

Returns:
the non-null immutable blob id
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport

getCanonicalId

URI getCanonicalId()
                   throws RemoteException,
                          IOException
Gets the canonical id of the blob, if known.

Returns:
the canonical id, if known; null otherwise.
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - if an error occurred

exists

boolean exists()
               throws RemoteException,
                      IOException
Tests if this blob exists on remote.

Returns:
the size
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - error reported by the remote

getSize

long getSize()
             throws RemoteException,
                    IOException,
                    org.akubraproject.MissingBlobException
Gets the size of the blob from remote.

Returns:
the size
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - error reported by the remote
org.akubraproject.MissingBlobException - error reported by the remote

delete

void delete()
            throws RemoteException,
                   IOException
Deletes a blob on the remote.

Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - error reported by the remote

moveTo

RemoteBlob moveTo(URI id,
                  Map<String,String> hints)
                  throws RemoteException,
                         org.akubraproject.DuplicateBlobException,
                         org.akubraproject.MissingBlobException,
                         UnsupportedOperationException,
                         IOException
Moves the blob contents to another on the remote.

Parameters:
id - the other blob
hints - the hints to pass to the remote
Returns:
the resulting Blob
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
org.akubraproject.DuplicateBlobException - error reported by remote
org.akubraproject.MissingBlobException - error reported by remote
UnsupportedOperationException - error reported by remote
IOException - error reported by the remote

openInputStream

RemoteInputStream openInputStream()
                                  throws RemoteException,
                                         IOException,
                                         org.akubraproject.MissingBlobException
Create a stream to read from the blob on the remote.

Returns:
a new stream to read from the remote server blob.
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - error reported by remote
org.akubraproject.MissingBlobException - error reported by remote

openOutputStream

RemoteOutputStream openOutputStream(long estimatedSize,
                                    boolean overwrite)
                                    throws RemoteException,
                                           IOException,
                                           org.akubraproject.DuplicateBlobException
Create a stream to write to the blob on the remote.

Parameters:
estimatedSize - the estimated size of this blob when the write is complete
overwrite - if false and this blob already exists then do not overwrite the contents but throw an exception instead
Returns:
a new stream to write to the remote server blob
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in rmi transport
IOException - error reported by remote
org.akubraproject.DuplicateBlobException - error reported by remote
